languages.text: [Указать благословенным перстом на Вортена] "Вот оно, исчадие Архиврага, что испоганило твою душу. Узри его здесь и сейчас, как зрю его я!"
[Point a blessed finger at Worten] "There stands the Archenemy's spawn that has corrupted your soul. Behold him as I do, here and now!"
languages.original_text: [Указать благословенным перстом на Вортена] "Вот оно, исчадие Архиврага, что испоганило твою душу. Узри его здесь и сейчас, как зрю его я!"

traits.locale_text: [Point a blessed finger at Worten] "Here is the Archenemy spawn that had corrupted your soul. Behold him as I do, here and now!"
[Point a blessed finger at Worten] "Here is the Archenemy spawn that had corrupted your soul. Behold him as I do, here and now!"

[Point a blessed finger at Worten] "There stands the Archenemy's spawn that has corrupted your soul. Behold him as I do, here and now!"

languages.text: [Señalar a Worten con un dedo bendito] «Ahí está el engendro del Archienemigo que ha corrompido su alma. ¡Obsérvelo tal y como yo lo veo, aquí y ahora!».
languages.original_text: [Point a blessed finger at Worten] "There stands the Archenemy's spawn that has corrupted your soul. Behold him as I do, here and now!"

traits.locale_text: [Señalar a Worten con un dedo bendito] «He aquí el engendro del Archienemigo que ha corrompido su alma. ¡Obsérvelo tal y como yo lo veo, aquí y ahora!».

languages.text: [以受祝福的手指指向沃尔腾]“看着他，就是这个混沌大敌的仆从腐化了你的灵魂！看穿他的真面目吧，就像此时此地的我一样！”
languages.original_text: [Point a blessed finger at Worten] "There stands the Archenemy's spawn that has corrupted your soul. Behold him as I do, here and now!"

traits.locale_text: [以受祝福的手指指向沃尔腾]“看着他，就是这个混沌魔物腐化了你的灵魂！看穿他的真面目吧，就像此时此地的我一样！”

languages.text: [Tendre un doigt béni vers Worten] « Voilà l'agent du Grand Ennemi qui a corrompu votre âme. Regardez-le comme je le fais et voyez sa vraie nature ! »
languages.original_text: [Point a blessed finger at Worten] "There stands the Archenemy's spawn that has corrupted your soul. Behold him as I do, here and now!"

traits.locale_text: [Tendre un doigt béni vers Worten] « Voilà l'agent du Grand Ennemi qui a corrompu votre âme. Regardez-le comme je le fais et voyez sa vraie nature ! »

languages.text: [祝福されし指でヴォルテンを指し示す]「お前の魂を堕落させた渾沌の勢力の落とし子がここにいる。私のように彼を見よ、今、ここで！」
languages.original_text: [Point a blessed finger at Worten] "There stands the Archenemy's spawn that has corrupted your soul. Behold him as I do, here and now!"

traits.locale_text: [祝福されし指でヴォルテンを指し示す]「お前の魂を堕落させた渾沌の勢力の落とし子がここにいる。私のように彼を見よ、今、ここで！」

languages.text: [Mit einem gesegneten Finger auf Worten zeigen] "Dort steht die Brut des Erzfeindes, die Eure Seele korrumpiert hat. Seht ihn, wie ich ihn sehe, hier und jetzt!"
languages.original_text: [Point a blessed finger at Worten] "There stands the Archenemy's spawn that has corrupted your soul. Behold him as I do, here and now!"

traits.locale_text: [Mit einem gesegneten Finger auf Worten zeigen] "Das ist die Brut des Erzfeindes, die Eure Seele korrumpiert hat. Seht ihn, wie ich ihn sehe, hier und jetzt!"

languages.text: [Kınayarak Worten'ı işaret et] "Şerbaşı'nın ruhunu yozlaştıran tohumu işte orada duruyor. Benim gibi sen de yaptıklarına şimdi, burada tanıklık et!"
languages.original_text: [Point a blessed finger at Worten] "There stands the Archenemy's spawn that has corrupted your soul. Behold him as I do, here and now!"
